title: Design System Style Guide
prompt:
Create a complete design system style guide in a single index.html file. Self-contained with inline CSS/JS, no external dependencies except Google Fonts.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Pick ONE bold aesthetic direction and commit fully: brutalist/raw, retro-futuristic, art deco/geometric, maximalist chaos, lo-fi/zine, dark/moody, organic/natural, or invent your own
- Typography: Use distinctive Google Fonts with personality - NO Inter, Roboto, Arial, or system fonts
- Color palette: Take a strong position - bold saturated, moody restrained, or high-contrast minimal. Show swatches with hex codes
- Spacing scale: Define a clear system (4px, 8px, 16px, etc.)
- Component examples: Buttons, cards, inputs, badges in your aesthetic
- Add CSS animations/transitions that match the vibe
- Include a dark/light theme toggle using CSS variables
- Make it UNFORGETTABLE - one thing someone will remember about this design

The style guide should showcase itself - the page displaying the guide should BE the aesthetic.
